name: paddo-tools
description: Collection of Claude Code plugins for DNS management, AI-assisted architecture, visual design, testing, and framework migration

plugins.name: dns
plugins.description: Manage DNS records via provider APIs

plugins.name: codex
plugins.description: Launch OpenAI Codex for software architecture analysis and research

plugins.name: gemini-tools
plugins.description: Launch Gemini for visual analysis, UI/UX work, and image generation

plugins.name: headless
plugins.description: Headless browser automation for site comparison and E2E testing

plugins.name: mobile
plugins.description: Native mobile app testing - E2E and cross-platform parity (iOS/Android)
